* Brand new Leaderboards! Check your rank by day, week, and month. Check out your peers rank in their Skills section - more competition, more fun, more learning!
* Now you can view the correct answers after the Challenge games!
* Come back every day and get a new daily bonus. Get even more XPs for show up streaks.
* The Code Playground editor got a face-lift.

Introducing SoloLearn PRO: an ad-free experience with advanced tools
* Set custom daily learning goals and learn faster.
* Get daily reports on the time spent on lessons, practice, and social activities.
* See who else is learning in your location.
* Check your profile views and get insights about your standing within the community.
* No Ads: meet your goals without distraction.

Code Coach just got better with new C++ hints and more challenges in Python!

BIG UPDATE

* Bug fixes and improvements

Bug fixes and improvements
Bug fixes and improvements

BIG NEWS!

We've updated the design for our courses inside the Learn tab, including new opportunities for practice. We've also created a new Community section where you can find Code Coach, community challenges, course written by the SoloLearn community, and more.

We also added an End of Module Project to our Python course that tests your skills as a developer — real questions faced by real developers during the interview process. When you complete this project, you will receive an all new "advanced certificate" for Python 3 to share on your LinkedIn or wherever you choose.

Finally, new for iOS 14, we created a SoloLearn widget that always tells you where you left off in your learning. Add it to your iOS home screen.

Check it all out by updating your app NOW.

BIG NEWS!

We've updated the design for our courses inside the Learn tab, including new opportunities for practice. We've also created a new Community section where you can find Code Coach, community challenges, course written by the SoloLearn community, and more.

We also added an End of Module Project to our Python course that tests your skills as a developer — real questions faced by real developers during the interview process. When you complete this project, you will receive an all new "advanced certificate" for Python 3 to share on your LinkedIn or wherever you choose.

Finally, new for iOS 14, we created a SoloLearn widget that always tells you where you left off in your learning. Add it to your iOS home screen.

Check it all out by updating your app NOW.

We're gearing up for our Black Friday and Cyber Monday deals! Update your app and turn on push notifications so you don't miss out.
We're gearing up for our Black Friday and Cyber Monday deals! Update your app and turn on push notifications so you don't miss out.
We've added new Code Coach practice for the SQL course, along with an End of Module projects for our Java and JavaScript courses. Happy learning!
We've added new Code Coach practice for the SQL course, along with an End of Module projects for our Java and JavaScript courses. Happy learning!
Bug fixes and improvements.
Bug fixes and improvements.

We've updated the design of our courses to make practice opportunities more visible. Practice is now visibly associated with specific lessons, helping you to keep track of them as you progress. We've also published End of Module Projects for our SQL, Data Science, Machine Learning and C# courses. Give them a try to earn your new certificate!
P.S. Don't forget to check out the New Year campaign! Set your 2021 learning goal and share it on SoloLearn or any of your favorite social networks.

We've also published End of Module Projects for our SQL, Data Science, Machine Learning and C# courses. Give them a try to earn your new certificate!
P.S. Don't forget to check out the New Year campaign! Set your 2021 learning goal and share it on SoloLearn or any of your favorite social networks.

The new SoloLearn Profile is here! With your new profile, you can:

* Track your learning progress with better tools
* See new opportunities to complete any practice exercises you might have missed
* View all the new badges we have added to guide you through your learning journey
* Enjoy a new design with light animation to make the profile more exciting...all you need to do is to unlock them

Update now and check out all the new goodness in your Profile!

We've added some awesome new courses for you to take, and a new data visualization feature! In this update, you will find three new Python courses, along with a new Code Playground integration in our Data Science course that allows you to visualize your data. We also made performance improvements and fixed minor bugs. Happy learning!

We've added some awesome new courses for you to take, and a new data visualization feature! In this update, you will find three new Python courses, along with a new Code Playground integration in our Data Science course that allows you to visualize your data. We also made performance improvements and fixed minor bugs. Happy learning!

Big news! We’ve added Kotlin as a new course! It includes Code Playground examples for you to try, plus Code Coaches and Code Projects to practice and test your knowledge.
We’ve also improved the design of the comments section in all our lessons and quizzes, as well as the feedback section when you answer quizzes. Enjoy!

Big news! We’ve added Kotlin as a new course! It includes Code Playground examples for you to try, plus Code Coaches and Code Projects to practice and test your knowledge.
We’ve also improved the design of the comments section in all our lessons and quizzes, as well as the feedback section when you answer quizzes. Enjoy!

To help you better understand specific topics in our Python Core course, and see what other users are talking about, we've added Q&A and user-generated code snippets to the Python Core course page.
To help you better understand specific topics in our Python Core course, and see what other users are talking about, we've added Q&A and user-generated code snippets to the Python Core course page.

Set a learning goal! We’ve made daily learning goals available to all our SoloLearn mobile app users. It’s quick and easy to set up. Visit your profile and tap the bottom of the streak section just below your profile picture. Choose what works best for you and remember, just by setting a goal, you’re on the path to success. Happy learning!
